emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available in the database. This aligns with selecting the most raw option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is best matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact match for the ingredient and represents the primary form of olive oil. This choice directly reflects the ingredient without unnecessary processing variations.

The ingredient '1 løg' is best matched with 'løg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database. This aligns with selecting the most raw option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 dl grøntsagsbouillon' is best matched with 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' because it is the closest available option for a ready-to-use bouillon. While not explicitly 'vegetable bouillon,' it is the most appropriate general bouillon option that is ready for consumption, aligning with the 'dl' (deciliter) measurement which implies a liquid, ready-to-use form.

The ingredient '1 dåse hakkede tomater' is best matched with 'tomat, flået, konserves' because it is the closest option for canned tomatoes. 'Hakkede tomater' (chopped tomatoes) and 'flået tomater' (peeled tomatoes) are both processed forms of canned tomatoes, and this option accurately reflects the processing level.

The ingredient '1 squash' is best matched with 'squash' as it is an exact match for the ingredient and represents the raw form. This aligns with selecting the most raw option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 dåse sorte bønner' is best matched with 'sorte bønner, konserves' because it is an exact match for canned black beans. This option accurately reflects the processing level (canned) of the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 dåse kidneybønner' is best matched with 'kidney bønner, konserves' because it is an exact match for canned kidney beans. This option accurately reflects the processing level (canned) of the ingredient.

The ingredient '300 g majs' is best matched with 'majs, kerner, konserves' because it is the most common form of corn available in the database that aligns with a quantity measurement, implying a ready-to-use form. While 'majs, hele kolber' is also corn, 'kerner, konserves' is more likely for a measured quantity in a recipe.

The ingredient '8 tortillas pandekager' is best matched with 'tortillabrød, hvede' because it is the most direct and common type of tortilla bread available in the database. This option accurately reflects the ingredient as a type of bread product.

The ingredient '150 g cheddar ost' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' because both are hard cheeses with similar production processes and therefore similar CO2 emissions. Since cheddar is not explicitly listed, parmesan is the most realistic comparison among the available cheese options.

The ingredient '1 håndfuld frisk koriander' is best matched with 'persille' because both are fresh herbs with similar growth and processing characteristics, leading to comparable CO2 emissions. Since fresh coriander is not explicitly listed, parsley is the most appropriate broader category for a fresh herb.

The ingredient '1 spsk smør' is best matched with 'smør, saltet' because it is the most direct and common form of butter available in the database. This option accurately reflects the ingredient without unnecessary variations.
